title: Building a Sustainable Tech Open Source Contribution Ecosystem: The Importance and Benefits
description: In this talk, we'll explore the power of open source contributions in today's tech world. We'll dive into: Why Open Source Matters: Learn why open source is a game-changer in the tech landscape and how it can benefit you. Role of Community for Success: Discover how creating an open source community can not only foster collaboration but also lead to increased revenue, funding, and long-lasting growth. Success Stories: I'll showcase real-world examples of open source projects that have thrived by embracing these practices. You'll see how these projects have become sustainable and achieved remarkable success. Sustainability in Practice: Learn practical steps and strategies for implementing open source principles in your own projects, ensuring their long-term sustainability and growth. Empowering Developers and Businesses: See how open source benefits both developers and businesses, promoting innovation, reducing costs, and fostering a community of passionate contributors.

title: Flutter Makes Animations Easy!
description: Flutter offers you a native cross-platform development environment. One of the biggest advertisements for the Flutter is "You won't say no to your UI/UX designer anymore" and one of the biggest reason for this is Animations.In this talk, we will go through, how you can create the widely used animations in Flutter by explaining the key concepts of it and of course, we will see some code.

title: How Meta built threads in only 5 months using Jetpack Compose.
description: Following its release in July of 2024, Metaâ€™s Threads became the most rapidly downloaded app ever with over 100 million downloads in its first week. Delve into the remarkable journey of Meta's Threads team as they constructed their text-based social media app in a mere five months, even without any prior experience using Compose, Android's modern declarative UI toolkit. Uncover the secrets behind Compose's transformative impact on Threads' development process, enabling the team to move with unprecedented speed and agility, crafting a high-quality app of such scale and complexity. Embrace the power of Jetpack Compose and embark on a journey towards accelerated Android development. Gain valuable insights into Compose's capabilities and discover how it can revolutionize your app creation process.

title: TDD: Code Clarity for Leetcode and Enterprise Success
description: In this talk, discover how Test-Driven Development (TDD) acts as a compass, eliminating code confusion, enhancing specification clarity, and powering solutions for Leetcode challenges. Explore its transformative impact on enterprise setups, paving the way for efficient, reliable, and scalable software development.

title: Unleashing the power of Flutter- building multiplatform experiences
description: Join us as we delve into the key strategies for accelerating and enhancing the Flutter app development journey. Explore the intricacies of project structuring, uncover the transformative potential of leveraging Material3 for design uplifts, unlock the latest groundbreaking capabilities of Dart3, master the art of meticulous package selection and seamless implementation, and refine your deployment process for more efficient release cycles. Discover an array of insider tips and tricks to supercharge your Flutter development prowess.

title: Surviving in the Artificially Intelligent World
description: It is a Developer perspective on how to survive in the Tsunami of AI

title: Building a Twitter Clone using one person framework
description: Building Real Time, Collaborative Web Applications in 2024 poses different challenges. Being scalable, real time and collaborative are table stakes. Additionally, the tech stack should provide a seamless integration with AI models. Phoenix Framework built using the functional programming language Elixir is fast emerging as the developers' choice for building such applications. In this talk, I demonstrate building a Twitter clone using the Phoenix Framework as the tech stack.

title: The game changing cloud architecture
description: This session deep dives into one of the most powerful architectures which is needed for firms that handle multiple variations in data. This session ensures a LIVE showcase is displayed for all audience

title: Realtime communication using websockets - Code walkthrough
description: 1. Walkthrough of different modes of rendering a web app (client side, server side rendering, static site generation etc) 2. Walkthrough of an app built using websockets to show how realtime apps work. How realtime updates communicate in a connected network.

title: Scaling Image Upload Systems: Exploring Methods and Designing for Infinite Scalability
description: In the digital landscape, effective image upload systems play a critical role in various applications. This talk dives into the necessity of robust file upload systems and the diverse methods available for their implementation. It delves into the comparative analysis of storing images on different platforms, including databases like MongoDB, local server hard disks, and cloud storage solutions like Amazon S3. The presentation further elaborates on the architecture and practicality of each approach, highlighting their pros and cons.

title: AI-Powered App Evolution: A Journey Through LLM Integration ðŸš€
description: In a world marked by rapid technological progress, the symbiosis of artificial intelligence and app development is revolutionizing the way we build exceptional user experiences. Join me for an immersive exploration as we uncover the seamless convergence of Makersuite, PaLMAPI, and the transformative Large Language Model (LLM) within the realm of app development. This remarkable alliance is poised to redefine the boundaries of your apps, enabling natural language comprehension and text generation that's almost indistinguishable from human creation. We'll delve into real-world implementation and reveal the boundless horizons this integration unveils, offering the tools to craft innovative, intelligent, and captivating mobile applications. Prepare to embark on an odyssey that propels your development skills into the thrilling frontier of AI-driven app experiences.

title: Event Driven Architectures
description: Discover the world of event-driven architectures and how Cloud can empower you in this domain. Explore various services/tech like Distributed Apache Kafka and other messaging services like Google Pub Sub & Eventarc, Unleash the potential of real-time, responsive systems with Cloud.

title: Mastering prompt engineering in ChatGPT
description: This session explores how AI affects our society and the challenging ethical questions it poses. We'll dive into the complex choices made in developing, using, and regulating AI and the potential consequences for our future. It will be an enlightening discussion on the moral and societal dimensions of AI.

title: Conquer Concurrency with GoLang
description: A tech talk that offers beginners a comprehensive introduction to the world of concurrency in GoLang. Attendees will learn about the fundamental concepts of concurrency, including Goroutines and Channels, and how GoLang simplifies concurrent programming. The talk will provide practical examples and insights to help beginners understand how to harness the power of concurrency in their GoLang projects. By the end of the session, attendees will have a solid foundation to confidently start writing concurrent code in GoLang, making their applications more efficient and responsive.

title: Crafting career advancement strategies - college to corporate
description: A tech talk that offers beginners a comprehensive introduction to the world of concurrency in GoLang. Attendees will learn about the fundamental concepts of concurrency, including Goroutines and Channels, and how GoLang simplifies concurrent programming. The talk will provide practical examples and insights to help beginners understand how to harness the power of concurrency in their GoLang projects. By the end of the session, attendees will have a solid foundation to confidently start writing concurrent code in GoLang, making their applications more efficient and responsive.
